name: Become a Celebrity
description:
Can you get millions of followers? Get viral and become a celebrity in this new and exciting puzzle game. Be the most famous influencer, model or even Hollywood’s next star. Featuring over 100 levels, play to choose your style, pick the hottest social media trend, interact with friends and even witness all the drama.



Featuring over 100 levels:
- What’s hot on social media right now? Renegade, Bugs Bunny, Bus It.. and so much more fun levels
- Meet today’s famous influencers and interact with them
- See yourself transform from being homeless to a rich hot celebrity



Puzzle Game
- Choose the hottest trend today. The more viral you are, the more followers you’ll get
- Stream all your content online, go live and interact with your fans
- Make money and get upgrades on your vlogger equipment, house and more.



Change your influencer style
- Model fashion week’s latest trends and attend special events!
- Do collabs and grab those sponsorships!
- Everybody loves a good transformation challenge - so go vlog it!



Everyday is a new adventure!



Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!



From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!



Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
